GSD.description:
dmaengine: zynqmp_dma: In struct zynqmp_dma_chan fix desc_size data type

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.15 by commit 4838969e4d95d2bd2995d1605b20d3144fcb3e74. For more details please see the references link.
